SEARCH
Package careerhub.services.company

Class ReviewApplicationsService

java.lang.Object
careerhub.services.company.ReviewApplicationsService
public class ReviewApplicationsService extends Object
Service class responsible for allowing Company Representatives to review, approve, or reject applications submitted for their internship postings.

This class belongs to the Control layer and performs the following:

  • Lists all internships owned by the representative
  • Displays all applications for a selected internship
  • Displays applicant information (name, major, year)
  • Allows approval or rejection of applications
  • Delegates status updates to DataManager

Applications move into SUCCESSFUL or UNSUCCESSFUL states depending on the representativeâ€™s decision.

  • Method Details

    • review

      public void review(CompanyRep rep)
      Executes the full workflow for reviewing applications belonging to the representative's internships.

      The steps include:

      1. List internships created by the Company Representative
      2. Prompt for internship ID
      3. List all applications for that internship
      4. Display applicant details (name, major, year)
      5. Prompt for an application ID to approve or reject
      6. Update the application status using DataManager

      If the internship has no applications, or if the entered ID is blank, the method returns gracefully.

      Parameters:
      rep - the Company Representative performing the review
